mapper.select: SELECT t.*, f.film_id, f.film_name, f.posters, h.hall_id, h.hall_name, s.seat_id, s.s_row , s.s_column, s.attr, u.uid, u.name, u.phone FROM trade t LEFT JOIN film f ON t.film_id = f.film_id LEFT JOIN hall h ON t.hall_id = h.hall_id LEFT JOIN seat s ON t.seat = s.seat_id LEFT JOIN user u ON t.uid = u.uid WHERE t.uid = #{uid} limit #{pageNumber}, #{pageSize}
